docs.title: Goochland Living Lab & Retreat
docs.text:
Welcome to our 15‑acre hub for STEM education, sustainable agriculture, weddings, and outdoor wellness. Explore our vision, programs, and how to visit.

Tip: Use the sidebar to navigate each section.

docs.title: Vision & Mission
docs.text: Our mission is to cultivate curiosity and community through hands‑on learning, regenerative farming, and memorable events.

docs.title: Site Map
docs.text: [Road]  Welcome/Farm‑Stand | Event Meadow | Educational Ag Zone | Homestead Plots | Conservation Woods | Recreation Corner

docs.title: Phased Development Plan
docs.text: Phase Timeline Highlights 0 Months 0‑6 Trail, mobile restrooms, micro‑classroom 1 6‑18 mo Greenhouse, aquaponics 2 18‑36 mo Pavilion, glamping 3 3‑5 yrs Obstacle course, community kitchen

docs.title: Programs & Revenue Streams
docs.text:
• Field trips & STEM camps
  • CSA and U‑pick produce
  • Weddings & retreats
  • Festivals and farm‑to‑table dinners

docs.title: Grants & Funding Opportunities
docs.text:
• SARE Producer Grant – up to $25 k
  • VA FAIRS Value‑Added Ag – match up to $250 k
  • NIFA Community Food Projects – up to $125 k
  • Virginia Tourism Micro‑Grant – $10‑20 k

docs.title: Visit Us
docs.text: We are located in Goochland County, VA. Public hours, tour bookings, and directions will be posted here soon.
